original_text: While they were reclining at the table eating, he said, “Truly I tell you, one of you will betray me—one who is eating with me.”
korean_text: 다 앉아 먹을 때에 예수께서 이르시되 내가 진실로 너희에게 이르노니 너희 중의 한 사람 곧 나와 함께 먹는 자가 나를 팔리라 하신대

sentences.original_text: While they were reclining at the table eating,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 식탁에 앉아 먹고 있을 때,

sentences.original_text: one of you will betray me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 한 사람이 나를 배반할 것이다

sentences.original_text: one who is eating with me.
